mkdir -p <ROOT_DIR>/logs/kwok-<CLUSTER_NAME>
cp <ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/kwok.yaml <ROOT_DIR>/logs/kwok-<CLUSTER_NAME>/kwok.yaml
mkdir -p <ROOT_DIR>/logs/kwok-<CLUSTER_NAME>/components
echo <OS>/<ARCH> ><ROOT_DIR>/logs/kwok-<CLUSTER_NAME>/binary-info.txt
cp <ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/logs/etcd.log <ROOT_DIR>/logs/kwok-<CLUSTER_NAME>/components/etcd.log
cp <ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/logs/kube-apiserver.log <ROOT_DIR>/logs/kwok-<CLUSTER_NAME>/components/kube-apiserver.log
cp <ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/logs/kube-controller-manager.log <ROOT_DIR>/logs/kwok-<CLUSTER_NAME>/components/kube-controller-manager.log
cp <ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/logs/kube-scheduler.log <ROOT_DIR>/logs/kwok-<CLUSTER_NAME>/components/kube-scheduler.log
cp <ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/logs/kwok-controller.log <ROOT_DIR>/logs/kwok-<CLUSTER_NAME>/components/kwok-controller.log
cp <ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/logs/audit.log <ROOT_DIR>/logs/kwok-<CLUSTER_NAME>/components/audit.log
